description: A composite fund to track financial transactions

allocatedFromIds.description: All the funds that this composite fund is allowed to receive money from. This would be 1 composite fund or none. If this field is blank their is no restriction on allocating to this composite fund

items.description: UUID of the composite fund this composite fund is allowed to receive money from

allocatedToIds.description: All the funds that this composite fund is allowed to send money to. This could be one or many.

items.description: UUID of the composite fund this composite fund is allowed to send money to

code.description: A unique code associated with the composite fund

description.description: The description of this composite fund

externalAccountNo.description: Corresponding account in the financial system. Will be recorded in payment generated as well.

fundStatus.description: The current status of this composite fund

fundTypeId.description: UUID of the composite fund type associated with this composite fund

ledgerId.description: UUID of the financial ledger associated with this composite fund

name.description: The name of this composite fund

acqUnitIds.description: acquisition unit ids associated with this composite fund

groupIds.description: group ids associated with this composite fund

tags.description: arbitrary tags associated with this composite fund

metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to record, provided by the server (client should not provide)
